department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
short_summary: Marine Infrastructure Inspection and Repair Services
description: request for proposals for marine infrastructure inspection and repair services. the request is for cleaning, inspection and replacement of components of mooring buoys, dock anchors and other marine infrastructure components at various locations within gulf island national park reserve. The anticipated period is one (1) year with two (2) additional one (1) year option periods.
full_summary:
# Marine Infrastructure Inspection and Repair Services RFP
## Solicitation Summary

Parks Canada is seeking a service provider to perform marine infrastructure inspection and repair services at various locations within the Gulf Islands National Park Reserve in British Columbia. The required services include:

* Cleaning and inspection of mooring buoys
* Replacement of docking anchors and other marine infrastructure components
* Two additional option periods of one year each, from April 1, 2024 to March 31, 2025, and from April 1, 2025 to March 31, 2026, under the same terms and conditions.

## Tender Details

* Solicitation Number: 5P420-22-0136/A
* Closing Date: March 6, 2023, at 4:00 PM
* Response Instructions:
	+ Submit bids via email to [soumissionsouest-bidswest@canada.ca](mailto:soumissionsouest-bidswest@canada.ca)
	+ No in-person or hard copy submissions will be accepted
	+ Electronic submissions via SAP Ariba are not accepted

## Contract Terms

* Contract Duration: 1 year, with two 1-year additional options
* Contract Start Date: Date of Contract Signing
* Contract End Date: March 31, 2024, with optional extensions to March 31, 2025, and March 31, 2026
* This RFP does not arise from a trade agreement.

## Bidder Instructions

* All technical and contractual inquiries must be submitted in writing to the Contracting Authority.
* Inquiries received after seven calendar days prior to the tender closing date may not receive a response.

## Important Notes

* The successful bidder will be required to perform the services in accordance with the National Park Regulations.

For more information and to access the RFP documents, please visit the Government of Canada's tendering service at [www.canadabuys.canada.ca](http://www.canadabuys.canada.ca).
